title: Literary Movements Quiz
description: Journey through the great literary movements, from Romanticism to Modernism and beyond

options: The 1920s and 1930s in Harlem, New York

questions.question: Which poet was a central figure of the Harlem Renaissance?

options: Strict formalism and adherence to rules
Rejecting mainstream values and exploring spontaneous prose, jazz, and spirituality

questions.question: Which writer is a key figure of the Beat Generation?

options: A movement focused on transportation in literature
A 19th-century American movement emphasizing individualism, nature, and spiritual experience over materialism

options: Exploration of individual freedom, choice, meaning, and the absurdity of human existence
